item.title: The WLFI contract 4-hour funding rate on Binance has dropped to -0.3446%.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the 4-hour funding rate of the WLFI contract on the Binance platform dropped to -0.3446%, and the daily rate was -2.067%.

item.title: DOLO is down 17.8% in the last 24 hours, currently trading at $0.267
item.description: On September 1st, based on HTX market data, DOLO dropped below $0.27 and is now trading at $0.267, with a 24-hour decline of 17.8%.BlockBeats Note: DOLO is one of the WLFI concept project tokens. Dolomite is a DeFi service provider pegged to USD1, and co-founder Corey Caplan is also the CTO of WLFI.

item.title: Backpack Launches WLFI Spot Trading
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, Backpack Exchange has now initiated WLFI spot trading.

item.title: On Binance, the WLFI contract's 4-hour funding rate has decreased to -0.23%, with a daily rate of -1.39%.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the funding rate of WLFI perpetual contracts on some CEXs is currently showing an abnormal negative value, suggesting that a large number of traders are taking short positions on WLFI. On the Binance platform, the 4-hour rate is currently at -0.2317% (with the daily rate reaching -1.39%).

item.title: The WLFI pre-market contract on Hyperliquid has been converted to a regular contract, now supporting up to 5x leverage.
item.description: On September 1st, as per official information, the WLFI perpetual contract on Hyperliquid has been transformed into a standard contract, which is capable of supporting up to 5 times leverage.

item.title: Ethereum Network Gas Price Drops to 32.4 Gwei
item.description: On September 1st, according to the data from Etherscan, following the launch of the WLFI token for about 1.5 hours, the Gas on the Ethereum network dropped to 32.4 Gwei.

item.title: Backpack Launches WLFI Perpetual Contract Trading
item.description: Update: On September 1st, based on official information, Backpack Exchange has now commenced perpetual contract trading with WLFI (World Liberty Financial).

item.title: On Binance, WLFI contract 4-hour funding rate has dropped to -0.137%.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the funding rate of the WLFI contract on some CEXs is currently presenting an abnormal negative value, suggesting that a significant number of traders are taking short positions on WLFI. Binance is currently at -0.137% (for 4 hours), and Bybit is at -0.4338% (for 4 hours).

item.title: WLFI Foundation once again spent 1 million USD to buy 3,239,000 WLFI tokens.
item.description: On September 1st, according to Arkham data, the official address of World Liberty Financial spent an additional $1 million USD just 20 minutes ago by purchasing 3.239 million WLFI. And in the past hour, it has cumulatively spent $2 million USD to purchase 6.498 million WLFI.

item.title: Binance Launches Exclusive HOLO TGE and Booster Event
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, Binance is set to launch the exclusive TGE event for Holoworld (HOLO) on September 2nd, 2025 at 16:00 UTC. Users will be able to participate in the token sale event to gain early access to the token. The sale will operate on a first-come, first-served basis, and each user can deposit up to 3 BNB.Binance will also initiate the Holoworld Booster event starting from September 2nd, 2025. Users who hold at least 61 Alpha points can participate and share a reward pool of 51,200,000 HOLO tokens.
